animeDescription: This is the third episode in the Lion Books Series, in which a boy who has fallen in love with a girl on a poster on the wall starts to look for her. This story depicts the heartache of adolescent first love in a low-key manner.
animeRelated: ['Lion Books', 'Amefuri Kozou', 'Adachi-ga Hara', 'Yamatarou Kaeru', 'Midori no Neko', 'Akuemon']
animeStaff: [['Tezuka Osamu', ['Director', 'Original Creator']], ['Nishimura Hiroshi', ['Storyboard', 'Animation Director']], ['Katsui Chikao', ['Animation Director']], ['Yokoyama Masakazu', ['Sound Effects']]]
